Package org.optim4j.ns

Class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>

java.lang.Object
org.optim4j.ns.AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A,​T>
Type Parameters:
A - an input solution agent type
T - a partially destroyed solution agent type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Optimizer<A>
public class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T> extends Object implements Optimizer<A>
An implementation of adaptive large neighborhood search algorithm.

This implementation accepts a solution agent which is a local optima of the problem domain. The optimization process transforms the same using destroy and repair heuristics over multiple iterations. The new solution in each iteration is accepted based on provided acceptance criteria. The process continues until the completion condition is satisfied.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer

      public AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer​(AcceptanceCriteria acceptanceCriteria, CompletionCondition completionCondition, List<Repairer<T,​A>> repairers, List<Destroyer<A,​T>> destroyers, AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores repairerScores, AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores destroyerScores, int updatePeriod, int scoreResetPeriod, Observer<A,​T> observer)
      Constructs an instance of adaptive large neighborhood search optimizer.
      Parameters:
      acceptanceCriteria - acceptance criteria for newly generated solution agent
      completionCondition - optimization completion condition
      repairers - list of repairers to be used for this optimization
      destroyers - list of destroyers to be used for this optimization
      repairerScores - scores for repairers
      destroyerScores - scores for destroyers
      updatePeriod - period by which the probabilities need to be updated for repairers and destroyers
      scoreResetPeriod - period by which the scores of repairer and destroyer heuristics need to be reset
      observer - observer to get notifications of optimization process
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if acceptance criteria or completion condition or repairer scores or destroyer scores is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if list of repairers or destroyers is null or empty

  • Method Details

    • optimize

      public A optimize​(A agent)
      Executes the optimization process. Accepts a solution agent as input optimizes the same using multiple destroy and repair heuristics based on their performance score following ALNS methodology. The new solution agent at each iteration is accepted based on result of acceptance criteria evaluation. An optimum solution is returned once the completion condition is satisfied.
      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer<A extends Agent>
      Parameters:
      agent - a valid solution agent representing a local optima
      Returns:
      the optimized solution agent
